title: Domestic beer consumption in Canada by age group 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of beer consumption. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
In general Share of beer consumption has rose over the Year.
Share of beer consumption is slightly increasing from 12_to_17 to 18_to_34, and lastly roughly constant from 18_to_34 to 65_and_over.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 12_to_17 and 18_to_34.
The highest Share of beer consumption, of value 38.7 was reached at Year 18_to_34
Minimum Share of beer consumption about 1.0 was reached at Year 12_to_17

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of beer consumption. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
Overall Share of beer consumption has increased over the Year.
Share of beer consumption is slightly increasing from 12_to_17 to 18_to_34, and lastly roughly constant from 18_to_34 to 65_and_over.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 12_to_17 and 18_to_34.

The line rapidly increased by 3770.0% from Year 12_to_17 to 18_to_34.
